MANAGEMENT.USE_DATASET_BASEURI: Use the baseURI of the dataset

REMOTE.BATCH_MODIFY_INFO: Modifies, all at once, the access credentials of (possibly) many repositories with the same serverURL.

CONFIG.NO_CONFIG_FOUND: No Remote Access Configuration found. Please, create a new one.

REMOTE.DELETE_REMOTE_REPO_INFO: The following repositories was referenced by the deleted project. Select the repositories you want to delete.
REMOTE.DELETE_REMOTE_REPO_REPORT_INFO: The deletion of the following remote repository/ies has failed
REMOTE.MATCH_USERNAME_INFO: If checked, modifies credentials of repositories with same serverURL and username (empty 'old' username indicates repositories with no associated username)
REMOTE.NO_REMOTE_REPO_WARN: There are no remote repositories related to this project

SETTINGS.ALLOW_INDEX_CHANGE_INFO: Tells if visitor user can customize the index-length for itself
SETTINGS.ALLOW_VISUALIZATION_CHANGE_INFO: Tells if visitor user can customize the visualization mode for itself
SETTINGS.CONCEPT_VISUALIZATION_INFO: Restricts the visualization of the Concept tree for the visitor user. Administrator user will still be able to customize the visualization for itself.
SETTINGS.INSTANCE_LIST_VISUALIZATION_INFO: Restricts the visualization of the instance list for the visitor user. Administrator user will still be able to customize the visualization for itself.
SETTINGS.LEX_ENTRY_VISUALIZATION_INFO: Restricts the visualization of the Lexical Entry list for the visitor user. Administrator user will still be able to customize the visualization for itself.
SETTINGS.RENDERING_LANG_INFO: Set the default language(s) used for rendering the resources

COMMONS.MAIL_PASSWORD_WARN: Password is stored wihtout encryption on the server

EMAIL.AUTHENTICATION_INFO: Tells if SMTP server requires authentication
EMAIL.MAIL_ALIAS_INFO: Alias name shown in the administration emails
EMAIL.MAIL_FROM_INFO: Email address used to send administration emails
EMAIL.MAIL_PASSWORD_INFO: Password of the above email address
EMAIL.MAIL_PASSWORD_WARN: Password is stored wihtout encryption on the server
EMAIL.SSL_PROTOCOLS_INFO: Specifies the SSL protocols that will be enabled for SSL connections

REMOTE_ACCESS.PASSWORD_INFO: Password of the remote triple store (if authentication is required)
REMOTE_ACCESS.REMOTE_ACCESS_CONFIG_INFO:
Configuration of the remote triple store that hosts the datasets in ShowVoc.
Note: if this is not properly configured, ShowVoc will not be able to create remote datasets for hosting stable resources.
REMOTE_ACCESS.URL_INFO: URL of the remote triple store
REMOTE_ACCESS.USERNAME_INFO: Username of the remote triple store (if authentication is required)

VB_CONFIG.ADMIN_EMAIL_INFO: Email of the administrator of VocBench/SemanticTurkey
VB_CONFIG.ADMIN_PASSWORD_INFO: Password of the administrator of VocBench/SemanticTurkey
VB_CONFIG.ST_HOST_INFO: Complete URL (protocol+hostname+port) of the SemanticTurkey host
VB_CONFIG.VB_CONFIG_INFO:
Configuration of the VocBench/SemanticTurkey instance dedicated to the development of unstable resources.
Note: if this is not properly configured, ShowVoc will not be able to connect with VocBench, so it will be impossible to accept contribution of under-development resources.
VB_CONFIG.VB_URL_INFO: URL of the VocBench instance accessible by the contributors

FOOTER.WEB_API_COPIED: Web API base URL copied to the clipboard

ACTIONS.SELECT_RESOURCE_TYPE_TO_PICK: Select the type of resource to pick

CONFIG.NO_CONFIG_FOUND: No configuration found. Please, create a new one

LANGUAGE.NO_LANG_INFO: No language selected implicitly means all languages

COMMONS.EMAIL_INFO: This will be used to send you an email with the response of the contribution evaluation

DEV.CONVERSION_REQUIRED_INFO: The data requires conversion from a non-RDF format

METADATA.IDENTITY_INFO: If left empty, an IRI will be generated by the system

STABLE.CONTRIBUTOR_IS_OWNER: The contributor is the owner of the resource?
STABLE.IM_OWNER: I'm the owner of the resource

LOAD.DATASET_NAME_INFO: The dataset name provided in the notification email of contribution approval
LOAD.EMAIL_ADDRESS_INFO: The email address with which you submitted the contribution

AUTH_HELPER.CAPABILITIES_DOCUMENTATION_REF: For further details about the capability vocabulary, please refer to the dedicated documentation.

LANG_REQUIREMENT.LANGUAGE_REQUIREMENT_INFO: Determines if the operation requires that the user which performs the operation has a specific language assigned. It is possible to select a language among those available in VB or to let the system infer it from a parameter of the operation.
LANG_REQUIREMENT.REQUIRE_PARAMETER_LANG: Require the language of a parameter

AUTH_HELPER.NO_PARAM_OPERATION: The operation does not foreseen any parameter
AUTH_HELPER.SCOPE_INFO: Refines the scope of the selected type

TYPE_RESTR.RESTRICTION_TO_PARAMETER_TYPE: Restrict to the type of a parameter
TYPE_RESTR.TYPE_RESTRICTION_INFO: Determines if the rdf capability is required on a specific resource type. It is possible to select a type among those available in VB or to let the system infer the type from a parameter of the operation.

CUSTOM_SERVICES.FORCE_RELOAD_INFO: Reload services (useful when the Custom Services are changed/loaded manually)

MESSAGES.INVALID_NAME: The provided name is not valid

PARAM_HELPER.ALLOWED_RETURN_TYPE: The allowed return type depends on the actual SPARQL operation
INTRO: The parameters are mapped to variables with the same name in the SPARQL query. Actual parameters passed to a service upon invocation are pre-bound to the corresponding variable in the SPARQL query. A reserved variable is
which is bound by default to the working graph of the project.
T_TYPE_OPT2_ADDENDA: in this case the SELECT must return one variable plus additional variables
PARAM_HELPER.T_TYPE_OTP1: might be any of the above accepted parameter types (in this case the SELECT must return one variable)

SERVICE.DESCRIPTION_INFO: A description of this custom service
SERVICE.SERVICE_NAME_INFO: The name used to group all operations defined by this custom service

SETTINGS.SUBCLASS_FILTER_INFO: Here you can create filters in order to hide subClasses of classes

UNSAFE_WARN.ELEMENT_COUNT: This LexicalEntry list has an amount of elements ({{elemCount}}) that exceeds the limit set in the settings ({{safeToGoLimit}}).

LINKS_FILTER.TOO_MUCH_RELATIONS_WARNING: The resource you are expanding has a big amount of relations, thus it would generate a lot of links and nodes that could confuse the graph visualization. It is highly recommended to filter out some relations in order to limit the graph size.

SETTINGS.HIDE_LITERAL_NODES_INFO: If checked, all the literal nodes will be hidden in the graph

HOME.DESCRIPTION: a web-based catalogue and viewer for OWL ontologies, SKOS(/XL) thesauri, Ontolex-lemon lexicons and generic RDF datasets.
HOME.FIND_MORE: Find out more about ShowVoc on its homepage at

FUNDED_BY.TITLE: ShowVoc is funded by
